H3.text: Football World Cup venue Soccer City is in which city. Jhb

A4.text: Soccer City the venue of the 2010 FIFA World Cup final.

A5.text: The 2010 FIFA World Cup final took place at FNB Stadium, the largest stadium in Africa.
